name: Son of a Witch (itch)
description:
You are Raven Ford, the son of a witch burned in the Salem Witch Trials.  Take revenge on the villagers that murdered your mother by turning them all into pigs!

Producer: Nicolas Siraco

Designers: Isaac Hessel-Robinson, Peter Mccabe

Artist: Daniel van Duzer

Sound Designer: Ava Udelson

Programmers: Dillon Drummond and Nathan Desjardins

The major parts I was in charge of were AI programming, player movement, player health, and menus.  This was my first time doing an AI with the state machine pattern.
